General.Description: Byteball was introduced on 25/12/2016 as a decentralized database with it's own native cryptocurrency, with Max Supply is 1 million until now. Byteball platform is where millions people in the world share the experiences through blockchains and high technologies of cryptocurrency.
General.Features: The core features of GBYTE are atomic exchange, for example, the two transactions either happen simultaneously or don't happen at all. Secondly, the regulated institutions can issue assets which are suitable with KYC/AML standards.Thirdly, the Immutable storage the data can neither be revised nor removed.
General.Technology: Byteball data is stored and ordered using directed acyclic graph (DAG) rather than blockchain. This technology helps all users protect their security and privacy. Moreover, GBYTE scalability is nor more limited as common blockchains and it enable to solve the blocksize issues. By updating new application, there are only transactions instead of blocks, which saves a lot of time for users. Especially, based on setting up a total order within the DAG, the consensus algorithm can gravitate towards units issued by commonly recognized reputable users.
